summary: Story of a rivalry between two tailors Dol-Seok, who is the best master artisan in charge of royal attire and Kong-Jin - genius like designer, born with dexterity and an excellent sense, plunges the court into scandal and tragedy.
cast: Suk-kyu Han|Soo Go|Park Shin-Hye|Yeon-Seok Yoo|Dong-seok Ma|Sung-tae Heo|Dal-hwan Jo|So-yul Shin|Yeji Yeon|Lee Yoo-Bi
title: Sang-eui-won
